entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
